num_frequencies.help: Specify the number of frequency steps for input representations

num_mels.help: Specifies the number of mel frequency steps for projection (-1 avoids projection but still performs clamping)

bidirectional.help: Whether or not the given architecture is bidirectional

dropout.help: Fraction of units to drop (per epoch?)

projection_trainable.help: Project to a learned input representation (learned from initial Mel projection)
